Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 用作基类，由支持内部分页的控件使用。

span.span: Functions as a base class used by controls that support internal pagination.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类公开某些属性、 方法和事件能够内部分页的所有控件共有的。The class exposes certain properties, methods, and events common to all controls that are capable of internal pagination. 继承的所有控件类还支持自定义分页，称为分块。All controls that inherit from the class also support custom pagination, known as chunking. 类似于类，此类用于具有长文本长度，如的控件， ，或。Similar to the class, this class is used for controls that have long text length, such as a , , or .

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

span.span: The first item visible on the current form page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件不是在当前窗体页上可见的则此值为-1。If the control is not visible on the current form page, this value is -1.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected MustOverride ReadOnly Property InternalItemCount As Integer
protected: abstract property int InternalItemCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the control.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The number of items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类必须重写此继承的属性。Classes that derive from must override this inherited property. 之间的差异属性和属性和类是，如果属性加载的控件视图状态之前被调用时，它将在视图中返回项的数目状态，而与不同的行为属性，它返回零。The difference between the property and the property of the and classes is that if the property is called before the control view state is loaded, it returns the number of items in the view state, unlike the behavior of the property, which returns zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ItemCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件中的项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the count of items in the control.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
The count of items in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须启用自定义分页。Custom pagination must be enabled. 默认值为 0，指示不能使用自定义分页。The default is 0, indicating that you cannot use custom paging. 对于的项使用的单位取决于控件。The units used for an item depend on the control. 例如，控件可能会用作列表项单位，而控件可能使用字符。For example, a control might use list items as units, whereas a control might use characters.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ItemsPerPage { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置分页后每页所显示的项数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of items displayed per page after pagination.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

value.span: 分页后每页显示的项数。

span.span: The number of items displayed per page after pagination.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为零，此属性不影响分页。If zero, pagination is not affected by this property. 如果不为零，将覆盖在分页窗体时，每页显示的项。If nonzero, overrides items displayed per page when the form is paginated. 默认值为 0。The default value is zero. 支持内部分页的移动控件还提供一种称为自定义分页功能。Mobile controls that support internal pagination also provide a feature called custom pagination. 通常情况下，此类控件要求你提供它们可以显示的所有数据。Normally, such controls require you to provide all the data that they can display. 开发人员指定的列表中的项的总数属性。Developers specify the total number of items that are in the list in the property. 属性指定每一页控件显示的项数。The property specifies how many items the control displays per page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来呈现的每页一个 200 项列表的八个项。The following code example shows how to use the property to render eight items of a 200-item list per page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property ItemWeight As Integer
protected: virtual property int ItemWeight { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取控件中单个项的近似权重。

span.span: Gets the approximate weight of a single item in the control.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

value.span: 控件中单个项的近似权重。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值-1 指示必须使用元素的默认权重。A value of -1 indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 继承的类必须重写此属性。The inheriting class must override this property. 有关重写此属性的详细信息，请参阅[分页支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2)。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并使用自定义列表控件。The following code example creates and uses a custom list control. 该示例演示如何重写属性类，以指定新的控件权重。The example demonstrates how to override the property of a class to specify a new control weight. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobilePagedControlSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePagedControlSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobilePagedControlSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobilePagedControlSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadItems As LoadItemsEventHandler

summary.span: 在控件自定义分页且需要更多数据时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control is custom-paginated and needs more data.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义分页控制时，你不要显式绑定控件。When control is custom-paginated, you do not explicitly bind the control. 分页后，控件将引发此事件，指示哪些部分数据必需的。After pagination, the control raises this event, indicating what part of the data is required. 应用程序可以处理此事件，并将绑定具有所需的数据的控件。The application can handle this event and bind the control with the required data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来呈现的每页一个 200 项列表的八个项。The following example shows how to use the property to render eight items of a 200-item list per page. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/cs/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileLoadListEventArgsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileLoadListEventArgsSample/vb/default.aspx#1)]
